transcript:
to laugh. 
"It's a bad business, eh?" 
"What is bad, Father?" 
"The wife!" said the old prince, briefly and significantly. 
"I don't understand!" said Prince Andrew. 
"No, it can't be helped, lad," said the prince. "They're all like that; one can't unmarry. Don't be afraid; I won't tell anyone, but you know it yourself." 
He seized his son by the hand with small bony fingers, shook it, looked straight into his son's face with keen eyes which seemed to see through him, and again laughed his frig
